name: Mountainer
description:
Description

Play with a hill climber who wants to climb the largest mountain in the whole world. 
See how far can you get high without falling.

Versions

The game started as a Jam game in 2010 on GameJolt. The endless runner genre was hot at the time with the release of Canabalt and other games so I wanted in the game jam to make an endless vertical runner with a twist.
Later, I decided to try to expand it and make a full flash game about it to sponsor which I managed to do in 2011.
Later after the Egyptian revolution in 2011, a group of friends of mine asked me if I could skin the game to be for the Egyptian elections so each person could select one of the hot candidates and try to get a higher score in the game as climbing a mountain was a metaphor for rising in popularity of the elections. The Arabic version is called "الكرسي" which means the chair (which is a metaphor for being the president and sitting on a throne).

Controls

Arrows: Move the player while climbing
Spacebar: Jump in direction of the Movement
